action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on the User Appearance tab to customize landing page and inbox settings.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the steps to change the password from the main settings tab.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Complete the two-step process to change the eSignature ID.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the visual signature for document signing.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates for patient summaries.
notes: Select and arrange sections of the patient's chart for CCDA summaries.
